ur_rna.Utilities

Class JniLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • ur_rna.Utilities.JniLoader

  • public class JniLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Loads a Native library or returns helpful error information if unsuccessful.

      • getJvmBits

        public static java.lang.String getJvmBits(java.lang.String result32,
                                          java.lang.String result64)
        Detect the architecture of the Java platform (32 or 64 bits -- this is NOT necessarily the architecture of the OS!!)
        Returns:
        returns result32 is the Java VM is 32-bit or result64 if the JVM is 64-bit.
